meanings.definition: A cereal plant cultivated for its seed
meanings.sent1: The farmer planted oats in the field.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating oatmeal for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: Why did the scarecrow refuse to eat the oats? Because he was stuffed!
meanings.sent4: The field of oats swayed gently in the breeze, like a golden sea.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked oat bread filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A seed of the oat plant
meanings.sent1: She sprinkled oats on top of her yogurt.
meanings.sent2: The horse happily munched on the oats in the stable.
meanings.sent3: Why did the squirrel carry the oat up the tree? To save it for later!
meanings.sent4: The tiny oat seed held the promise of a tall, waving plant.
meanings.sent5: The bird pecked at the scattered oats on the ground.

meanings.definition: A breakfast food made from oats
meanings.sent1: Mom made delicious oat pancakes for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: I like to add fruits to my bowl of oatmeal.
meanings.sent3: Why did the comedian tell jokes to the oatmeal? To make it chuckle!
meanings.sent4: The warm bowl of oatmeal was a comforting hug on a cold morning.
meanings.sent5: The steam rose from the bowl of creamy oats.
